## Description {#details}

This is the base class for diagnostic handling in LLVM.

The handleDiagnostics method must be overriden by the subclasses to handle diagnostic. The &#42;RemarkEnabled methods can be overriden to control which remarks are enabled.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnostichandler-h">DiagnosticHandler.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### handleDiagnostics() {#a2c46bc0e22cefe4cf855cd9606d0da23}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::DiagnosticHandler::handleDiagnostics (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfo">DiagnosticInfo</a> &amp; DI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Override handleDiagnostics to provide custom implementation.

Return true if it handles diagnostics reporting properly otherwise return false to make <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext/#aad03ef5cfbe6e7cad076d9e45ba06592">LLVMContext::diagnose()</a> to print the message with a prefix based on the severity.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnostichandler-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnostichandler-h">DiagnosticHandler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### DiagHandlerCallback {#ae7bf9538a2db14248d9770b4b8165439}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="DiagnosticHandlerTy llvm::DiagnosticHandler::DiagHandlerCallback = nullptr">
DiagHandlerCallback is settable from the C API and base implementation of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/diagnostichandler">DiagnosticHandler</a> will call it from <a href="#a2c46bc0e22cefe4cf855cd9606d0da23">handleDiagnostics()</a>.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> derived class of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/diagnostichandler">DiagnosticHandler</a> should not use callback but implement <a href="#a2c46bc0e22cefe4cf855cd9606d0da23">handleDiagnostics()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnostichandler-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnostichandler-h">DiagnosticHandler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>
